amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the prioritization of broad-based criminal justice reform.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1033 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1033 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Booker. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2020) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the prioritization of broad-based criminal justice reform.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1033 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1033 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Booker.
